title: The Worst TV Interview I’ve Ever Seen (Ep 1343)
description:
In this episode, I address the live meltdown on Fox News by a Biden media hack when questioned about Biden’s atrocious coronavirus response. I also address another explosive development about the corrupt Mueller probe. Did they wipe their phones out to hide their text messages? 

News Picks:

Unbelievable! The corrupt Mueller team wiped their phones of the data before turning them over.


Joe Biden’s media hack melts down on Fox News.

Questions multiply about Biden’s use of scripted questions and answers at events

Adam Schiff is at it again. He’s found a new “whistleblower.” . 

Professional sports is taking a reputational beating since they turned “woke.”
